relationships.name: Lance
relationships.howTheyMet: In high school when they were in the same dance class
typicalActivities: Watching Jubilee videos together on YouTube
secretly smoking weed and laughing together

history.event: Met in dance class while Lance was a sophomore in high school and Navjot was a junior
Navjot attended Lance's senior prom as her then boyfriend Jecci's date to the prom.
Lance and Navi became distant as Lance went to college in Newark and Navi was in her second year of community college
Lance was there for Navjot after she got cheated on by her now ex-boyfriend, Jecci
Lance and Navjot's friendship became rocky since Lance was more there for her ex-boyfriend Jecci due to their brotherly bond and Jecci being the one who hurt Navi by cheating.

Lance and Navjot rekindled their friendship as Lance apologized for not properly being there for her. And they began to hang out at Lance's house more regularly. Although Jecci and Navjot are still not on good terms.
They got tattoos together on Friday the 13th. Lance got the sword from Adventure Time on his thigh and Navi got finger tattoos.
Got drunk together and laughed so hard together while imagining The Weeknd performing live at the Bahama Breeze they were eating at together.

frequentDisagreements: what video to watch on YouTube

history.event: Both participated in a local anime convention cosplay competition.
Traveled together to Japan to explore anime culture.

relationships.name: Jecci
relationships.howTheyMet: In high school when they were in the same dance class
relationships.emotionalTone: Initially loving, later complex and strained
relationships.conflictHandling: Conflict led to the relationship's termination

history.event: Navjot met Jecci in dance class while she was a junior and he was a sophomore in high school.
Navjot broke up with her abusive boyfriend, Malay. Jecci was there for her during the breakup.
Three days after the breakup, Navjot and Jecci began dating.
Jecci and Navjot attended Navjot's junior prom.
Jecci performed a dance at a talent show to ask Navjot to his junior prom.
Jecci and Navjot attended Jecci's junior prom along with Lance and Frankie, who attended with their respective girlfriends.
Jecci and Navjot attended Navjot's senior prom along with Lance and Frankie, who attended with their respective girlfriends.
Arguments became more frequent between Navjot and Jecci since Navjot started her first year in community college while Jecci started his senior year of high school.
Jecci did a flashmob with Lance and Frankie to ask Navjot to his senior prom.
Jecci and Navjot attended Jecci's senior prom along with Lance, who attended with Julia, and Frankie, who attended with Ysabel.
Jecci and Navjot's relationship grew more toxic as Jecci chose to forgo college to do a car apprenticeship while Navjot started her second year in college.
Arguments became a daily occurrence, and Jecci and Navjot grew isolated from their high school friends.
The relationship ended when Jecci cheated on Navjot.
Both have moved on to new relationships. Although they are not on good terms, they remain cordial for Lance because they are both close to him.

relationships.name: Christian
relationships.howTheyMet: Met at a mutual friend's game night

history.event: Met on Hinge
Had a great first date that stuck out to Navi when comparing it to the other men from all the dating apps.
Christian and Navi officially started happily dating
Celebrated their 1 year anniversary by going to The Weeknd concert along with Lance and Navi's younger sister Suki
Played lots of Minecraft together on Lance's Minecraft Multiplayers Server.
Celebrated their 2 year anniversary.

frequentDisagreements: What show to watch together next
Choosing which new game to buy
